all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Thus was it made known that our Redeemer spent his time during his sojourn in the world of spirits, instructing and preparing the faithful spirits of the prophets who had testified of him in the flesh;
Doctrine and Covenants 138:36
Quote of the Day
"Your worth isn’t tied to obedience. Your worth is constant; it never changes. It was given to you by God."
Sister Tamara W. Runia | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
